name: MLK Trading Season 4 ‚Äî $2,500 MLK Rewards
description:
We‚Äôre excited to launch a 30-day trading volume event starting Jan 8 (UTC) with a total reward pool of $2,500 in MLK!

üîë Event Details

Daily Rewards: $83 in MLK distributed each day
Eligibility: Top 10 wallets with at least $15,000 daily trading volume on PancakeSwap V3
Reward per Wallet: Approx. $8.3 in MLK

üìå Rules

If more than 10 wallets qualify on a given day, 10 winners will be randomly selected from eligible participants.
Only wallets submitted before the deadline will be considered.
Each wallet can claim rewards up to 1 time during the entire event (anti-monopoly rule).
All trades must be executed directly on PancakeSwap V3.
All rewards will be distributed to Arbitrum chain.
**Raffle results within Galxe are not related to the actual event winners. Rewards will only be granted to wallets that meet the trading requirements and are selected through the daily draw.
**For eligible wallets, rewards will be distributed within two weeks after the event ends.

‚è∞ Event Period

2026 Jan 8 ~ 2026 Feb 7 (UTC)

name: Landshare $LAND Lottery 2.0
description:
## LAND Lottery:  Early Belief, Better Odds

LAND Lottery 2.0 is live. This round is designed to reward longer-term holders and early participants, not quick entries. The campaign runs for 30 days, and anyone can join as long as they meet the holding requirement.

### üß† Core Rules (Read This First)
**To be eligible for the lottery:**
- You must buy at least 50 LAND
- You must hold those tokens for 15 consecutive days
- Your LAND must be purchased directly on PancakeSwap
- Wallet-to-wallet transfers do not qualify

If you sell, transfer, or move the LAND during the **15-day holding period**, your entry is disqualified.

**üéüÔ∏è Tickets & Entry Timing:** 
- 50 LAND = 1 base ticket
- No maximum cap: more LAND = more tickets
- The campaign lasts 30 days, so you can join early or later (e.g. Day 1 or Day 15)

**However, when you enter matters üëá**

### ‚ö° Early Entry Multipliers
To incentivize early participation, ticket multipliers apply based on when you buy your LAND:

- Days 1‚Äì3: üî• **x3 tickets**
- Days 4‚Äì10: ‚ö° **x2 tickets**
- Days 11‚Äì15: x1 ticket

üö® **After Day 15, new entries are no longer accepted**, as the 15-day holding requirement must still be met before the campaign ends.

### üõí How to Participate
- Buy 50+ LAND directly on [PancakeSwap](https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?chain=bsc&outputCurrency=0xA73164DB271931CF952cBaEfF9E8F5817b42fA5C)
- Connect your wallet & verify your purchase 
- Complete other Galxe tasks
- Hold your LAND for 15 days in a row

That‚Äôs it - once the holding period is complete, you‚Äôre eligible.

#### üí∞ Rewards
- 1,000 LAND total prize pool
- 10 winners selected at random
- Odds are weighted by the number of valid tickets you hold

More tickets = better chances.

#### ‚è≥ Final Notes
This lottery rewards commitment, not speed.
Enter early, hold longer, and maximize your odds.

**LAND Lottery 2.0 is live, plan your entry wisely.**

name: Mahjong Stars: A Quest for $TILE
description:
**Mahjong Stars is launching soon.**

Complete the quest to get early access and earn $TILE before the public release.
Connect your wallet, follow the steps, and be ready for launch. Early players get the best rewards.

**$TILE** is our onchain token - it gives discounts on Star Points, unlocks premium matches and events, lets you buy NFTs, and earns staking rewards.
Star Points are the in-game (off chain) currency you use to play matches, place bets, earn rewards, and cash out through NFTs.

At the end, top players secure IRL Gold Tile collectibles - real physical Mahjong tiles made with real gold accents from our limited 144-piece set.

name: BTC on TON & Beyond
description:
# The aaaBTC Trading Challenge

### üìä aaaBTC Trading Challenge: $10,000 Raffle

Master the markets across 5 networks. Accumulate volume and prove your liquidity. We are giving away **0.1 BTC (Total)**: 20 winners will receive **0.005 aaaBTC** each!

### **Task Requirements:**

* Accumulate at least **$10 in trading volume** on the **aaaBTC/Stable** pairs.
* Supported Networks: **Ethereum, Arbitrum, Base, BNB Chain (BSC), and World Chain**.
* Platforms: Uniswap V3

**Verification Links (Uniswap Pools):**

* [Eth Pool 1](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/ethereum/0x2Cc2cCf05d75Deb6Ec1d0EdcA62eAa0909746bB6) | [Eth Pool 2](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/ethereum/0xe28f06FafC7EC902F7d1D1675256EfA58c3A234b)
* [Arb Pool 1](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/arbitrum/0xB291B377e28736B7F170e55471202b616B45687A) | [Arb Pool 2](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/arbitrum/0xbFB94855Ab497C96739183331d22E93ff61B2a32)
* [Base Pool](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/base/0x19bFC2c53965DB063B3bA5E6F65E7165c81ce0Ab)
* [BSC Pool](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/bnb/0x380e902682311b89576a2757394ba370a05b2310c933446c900a1e061ecb4bee)
* [World Chain Pool 1](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/worldchain/0x0a1f423Bf93d4593873FdbA856EBCFceB060cA84) | [World Chain Pool 2](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/worldchain/0xaEdf410D3Dc5d51de3937ce11eE3be65bfDA025e)
